tool_description: Compares expected versus actual inventory levels and identifies discrepancies for investigation and adjustment purposes.

reconciliation_date.description: Date for reconciliation in ISO 8601 format

item_filter.description: Array of specific item SKUs to reconcile (empty means all items)

tolerance_percentage.description: Acceptable variance percentage before flagging discrepancy

include_adjustments.description: Whether to include recent adjustments in expected counts

error_messages: Location not found: The specified location does not exist
Invalid date format: Reconciliation date must be in ISO 8601 format
Future date not allowed: Reconciliation date cannot be in the future
Tolerance out of range: Tolerance percentage must be between 0 and 50
Item not found: One or more items in the filter do not exist
usage: Provide location_id and reconciliation_date. Optionally filter specific items, set tolerance percentage, and control whether to include recent adjustments.

total_items_checked.description: Number of items included in reconciliation

discrepancies_found.description: Number of items with discrepancies exceeding tolerance

total_variance_value.description: Total monetary value of variances found

discrepancy_details.description: Array of discrepancy records in format 'SKU:Expected:Actual:Variance'
